name: Alpho's Escape
description:
Alpho is a sentient robot engineer, who spends each day toiling on a production line at one of (Insert evil sounding name here)-corps factories.

The game opens as a mysterious near-disaster occurs on alpho's production line, and he is sent to have his alpha drive reset.
On the way to the reset facility Alpho see's a chance to escape, and takes it.

This is where the player takes over, and is tasked with guiding Alpho through a number of areas in order to escape.

Alpho is a genius of engineering, capable of crafting gadgets and upgrading his systems to overcome challenges. He can use tools to destroy walls, use gadgets to deactivate security systems, and use stealth to avoid being detected.

He will need all of these skills if he is to escape the factory and find his way to freedom.

This project was completed as part of JamCraft2. All assets included in the game were either made within the jam time, or are available freely to anyone.

Authors : Lewis Fiford, Mateusz Śliżewski, Gareth Godliman.

https://itch.io/jam/jamcraft2
